title: FaaS You Like It: Create Serverless Functions & Run Anywhere
abstract:
"Serverless" is a hot topic right now, and something that a lot of developers are keen to try.

A lot of focus has been on implementations that are proprietary to and only run on a single provider's cloud.

In this talk, I'll show how you can develop "serverless" functions on your laptop, with an open source platform and run them where you like.
description:
However, if you attend a Serverless event, you may come away with the impression that it's a world of proprietary walled gardens from the major cloud providers. In this talk I will cover:
  • The case for open source serverless frameworks in general
  • The fnproject (fnproject.io) in particular
  • Implementing serverless Shakespeare on a laptop
